mapper.insert: REPLACE into car_park.availability( car_park_no, total_lots, available_lots, update_datetime, lot_type ) SELECT avai.car_park_no, avai.total_lots, avai.available_lots, avai.update_datetime, avai.lot_type FROM car_park.carpark_data avai inner join car_park.car_park cp on avai.car_park_no = cp.car_park_no
